block.p: I’m on safari in Africa with my family. It’s exciting! We’re going to travel by helicopter tomorrow. I’ve never flown in a helicopter before … I’m a little scared! There are a lot of things I want to do here! I’ve never ridden an elephant but I’d like to! And I’ve never seen giraffes close-up, but I’d like to! I’d like to take pictures of them with my new smartphone. And I’d like to sail on the lake, but I’m too scared!
